name: Mythic Protocol
description:
Retainer Academy - The first project for Mythic Protocol is a fun gameplay-first roguelite ARPG with blockchain technology, using the collaborative economy as the future of gaming, allowing players to trade, sell and publish their assets without any predefined scarcity.

Retainer Academy right now is at pre-alpha stage but already super smooth and optimized with very low PC requirement. The most fun part is we can do online multi co-op max 3persons/team Try your self this game and give me your opinion about this game.

since it is an online game, you need to register your self first at : https://mythic.xyz/retaineracademy?code=mythicp

all you need to do is go through these steps:

1. Sign up for a Mythic Protocol Account

2. Enter the referral code: mythicp

3. Download the launcher

4. Login, and download the game through the launcher

5. And voila, game is on!

#rpg #shooter #action #survival #fangame #multiplayer
